trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The derro has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the derro has disadvantage on attack rolls.

action.name: Hooked Spear
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, the derro can choose to deal no damage, and instead the target has the {@condition prone} condition.

action.name: Throwing Hammer
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.
